title: Milk powder price to rise
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Milk powder importers say that the price of a packet of imported milk powder will be increased in the future.
Accordingly, plans are underway to increase the price of a 400 gram packet of milk powder by Rs. 550-600, however, the importers stated that no final decision has been taken in this regard so far.
They point out that a final decision will be taken in the next two days to increase the price of milk powder.
